body.para: Please do not reply directly to this email. All additional comments should be made in the comments box of this bug report.
Summary: Review Request: pari - Number Theory-oriented Computer Algebra System

------- Additional Comments From tibbs@math.uh.edu 2006-05-09 12:12 EST ------- Is there any hope of progress here? Someone here actually wants this package so it would be nice to get it into the distro.
